price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߞߘߐߓߐ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߦߋ߲߬ ߠߋ߬ ߸ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߙߍߦߙߍ߫ ߜߍߟߍ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߜߙߊߜߙߊߜߙߊ߫
arabic: هُنَالِكَ ٱبۡتُلِيَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَزُلۡزِلُواْ زِلۡزَالٗا شَدِيدٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: hunālika ub'tuliya al-mu'minūna wazul'zilū zil'zālan shadīdan
